com.corvolution.mesana.rest

Class RestApiConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.corvolution.mesana.rest.RestApiConnector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddressData, Measurement, MeasurementCollection, SensorCollection, SensorData, Task, TaskCollection

    public class RestApiConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents manager for getting, sending data and pushing changes to server.

        This method sends data to server.
        Parameters:
        json - data as string to send to server
        url - path to server that data would be sent
